Arrive !GitHub release latest SemVerhttps://github.com/tranzystorekk/arrive/releases/latest !Crates.iohttps://crates.io/crates/arrive About A simple tool to fetch your Advent of Code input and submit your solutions. Key features and goals: - keeps your current AOC day selection and solution status in a TOML state file for human readability - caches input files to ease load on AOC servers - reasonably minimal dependencies Directories used see dirs for more info: | Description | Path | | - | - | | Cache | or | | State | or | Installation Arch Linux: Arrive is available on the AUR as arv. You can install it with your preferred AUR helper. Example: Via Cargo: From source: Usage Set a new session token see Token section: Print currently stored session token: Select currently processed advent day: Show current selection and day completion status: Print input for current selection: Save input to file: Submit advent solution for current selection. If is omitted, STDIN is read instead. Token For the web commands , to work, a valid AOC session token needs to be supplied to . To obtain such a token, do the following: 1. Login to AOC: <https://adventofcode.com/auth/login> 1. In your browser, open the developer tools 1. Navigate to Storage -> Cookies 1. Find and copy the entry named 1. Run These tokens have long expiration dates, so you can typically set-and-forget once. Acknowledgements Deeply inspired by aocf!
